name: Headliner: NoviNews
description: A stack of news article sits on your desk, two stampers on each side - green to approve, red to reject. Your reporting team is hacking away in the background as corporate music plays through the loudspeaker. It's time to make decisions...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 (64bit) Processor: Inte i3+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel i5+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
